definition: Identifying and fixing errors, bugs, or unexpected behavior in code

positive_examples: Debugging identified the off-by-one error causing the array index out of bounds.
The AI debugger traced the null pointer to an uninitialized variable.
Code debugging revealed the race condition in the concurrent access pattern.
The assistant fixed the bug by adding the missing null check before dereferencing.
training_hints.disambiguation: Active identification and resolution of specific code errors
